医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Metrion Biosciences 任命 Lee Patterson 为首席执行官专业临床前合同研究组织 (CRO) 和离子通道筛选领域的领导者 Metrion Biosciences (“Metrion”) 今天宣布任命 Lee Patterson 为其新任首席执行官，自 2024 年 12 月 2 日起生效。一位经验丰富的生命科学和 CRO 高管Lee 将领导公司寻求执行雄心勃勃的增长战略，增强其专业服务并进一步拓展全球主要市场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Metrion-Biosciences-appoints-Lee-Patterson-as-CEO.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Metrion-Biosciences-appoints-Lee-Patterson-as-CEO.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3303c4cf-21fb-4195-9de3-4adf4766d295 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 08:27:00 -0500 Metrion Biosciences appoints Lee Patterson as CEO
特定的蛋白质模式可以在诊断前 16 年预测 IBD厄勒布鲁大学的科学家们已经确定了血液中的特定蛋白质模式，可以在诊断前 16 年预测炎症性肠病 (IBD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Specific- Protein-patterns-can-predict-IBD-up-to-16-years-before-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Specific- Protein-patterns-can-predict-IBD-up-to-16-years-before-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe39dee6-0374-4e24-bc0e-9c04e13c526c Tue, 26 Nov 2024 07:47:00 -0500 Specific protein patterns can predict IBD up to 16 years before diagnosis
研究揭示癌细胞如何在低血糖环境中逃避化疗一项新的研究表明，癌细胞的实验室实验揭示了肿瘤逃避旨在饥饿和杀死它们的药物的两种方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Study-reveals-how-cancer-cells-evade-chemotherapy-in-low-glucose-environments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Study-reveals-how-cancer-cells-evade-chemotherapy-in-low-glucose-environments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cf6ecfd-7727-4869-b25a-cdb234425d01 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 07:41:15 -0500 Study reveals how cancer cells evade chemotherapy in low-glucose environments
AZoNetwork 庆祝页面浏览量突破 10 亿总部位于曼彻斯特的科学营销和出版平台 AZoNetwork 正在庆祝其科学网站网络的页面浏览量突破 10 亿次。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Science-publishing-platform-celebrates-one-billion-page-views-across-its-websites.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Science-publishing-platform-celebrates-one-billion-page-views-across-its-websites.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bbcc8a7-9721-49c1-a534-1ee114ede312 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:57:00 -0500 AZoNetwork celebrates one billion page views
研究表明癌症是均匀生长的肿块科隆大学和巴塞罗那基因组调控中心 (CRG) 的研究人员发现，癌症在整个肿块中均匀生长，而不是在外边缘。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Study-shows-cancers-are-uniformly-having-masses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Study-shows-cancers-are-uniformly-having-masses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57814725-d349-44f5-8883-72176f196775 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:55:56 -0500 Study shows cancers are uniformly growing masses
研究表明脑震荡对非周期性大脑活动的影响一项针对高中橄榄球运动员的新研究发现，脑震荡会影响一个经常被忽视但很重要的大脑信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Research-shows-impact-of-concussions-on-aperiodic-brain-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Research-shows-impact-of-concussions-on-aperiodic-brain-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=305a0438-bc00-436b-a1f0-41cc5f31ddaa Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:47:00 -0500 Research shows impact of concussions on aperiodic brain activity
俄克拉荷马大学教授因胰腺癌研究荣获著名的帕拉德奖俄克拉荷马大学医学院 George Lynn Cross 医学、外科和细胞生物学教授、俄克拉荷马大学健康史蒂芬森癌症中心全球肿瘤学副主任李敏博士将获得国际奥委会颁发的 2024 年 Palade 奖胰腺学协会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/University-of-Oklahoma-professor-honored-with-prestigious-Palade-Prize-for-pancreatic-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/University-of-Oklahoma-professor-honored-with-prestigious-Palade-Prize-for-pancreatic-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f203908-f030-4a45-a30e-53dd88048871 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:19:29 -0500 University of Oklahoma professor honored with prestigious Palade Prize for pancreatic cancer research
印第安纳州医院因垄断担忧而撤回合并申请印第安纳州特雷霍特的两家竞争对手医院周一撤回了合并申请，就在该州因此类医疗垄断遭到越来越强烈的反对而对该交易做出裁决的几天前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Indiana-hospitals-pull-merger-application-after-pushback-over-monopoly-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Indiana-hospitals-pull-merger-application-after-pushback-over-monopoly-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e2efcf4-6fd2-4716-a846-0216dd2415d9 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:03:56 -0500 Indiana hospitals pull merger application after pushback over monopoly concerns
移民拘留中心承包商就加州健康检查提起诉讼GEO 集团是美国最大的私人监狱承包商之一，上个月对加州官员提起联邦诉讼，要求推翻一项允许当地公共卫生官员检查移民拘留设施的州法律。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Immigration-detention-center-contractor-sues-over-California-health-inspections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Immigration-detention-center-contractor-sues-over-California-health-inspections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9dc1f54e-a3d8-47a0-8727-c885285cfb96 Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:02:00 -0500 Immigration detention center contractor sues over California health inspections
佛罗里达州德勤运营的计算机系统切断了新妈妈享受医疗补助的资格5 月中旬，曼迪·洛克克斯 (Mandi Rokx) 生下了一个 3 个月大的婴儿，佛罗里达州一家机构发出一封警告信，警告他们两人都将被排除在医疗补助 (Medicaid) 之外，该计划是针对低收入或残疾人的健康保险计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Floridae28099s-Deloitte-run-computer-system-cut-off-new-moms-entitled-to-Medicaid.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Floridae28099s-Deloitte-run-computer-system-cut-off-new-moms-entitled-to-Medicaid.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6df9029c-a3ba-4de7-9cc8-39b292245c2e Tue, 26 Nov 2024 06:00:00 -0500 Florida’s Deloitte-run computer system cut off new moms entitled to Medicaid
